mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (uid, username,showname, password, email, sex,uwork,joindate ) values (#{uid}, #{username}, #{showname},#{password},#{email},#{sex},#{uwork},#{joindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_user WHERE username = #{0} and password = #{1}
mapper.update: update tb_user set privilege=#{1} where uid = #{0}
